oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Apple scab (Venturia inaequalis)and induced resistance.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kromann Jensen, BSc.stud. Susanne
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Fruit and berries
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This B.Sc project report presents an introductory review of the apple scab pathothosystem and induced resistance both generally and related to Malus, Venturia inaequalis and the resistance-inducing compound Bion. The project describes experiments performed with the resistance-inducer Bion to control scab.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Kromann Jensen, BSc.stud. Susanne (2003) Apple scab (Venturia inaequalis)and induced resistance. KVL, Department of Plant Biology, Plant Pathology Section.
